nodes.text: The Imperial Mark IV Sentinel Droid was a type of battle droid used by the forces of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. A number of Mark IV Sentinels were among the Imperial forces stationed at the Imperial base on the planet Taral V.
The Imperial Mark IV Sentinel Droid is a type of enemy encountered in the Flashpoint "Taral V" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
